title: Acknowledgments
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body">For the realization of this catalogue and exhibition, thanks are due to the following individuals:

Dennis Ball, Judith Barter, Sylvain Bellenger, Lori Boyer, Jack Perry Brown, Christine Conniff-O’Shea, Kelsey Coons, Craig Cox, Stephanie D’Alessandro, Daniel Dorough, Carissa Kowalski Dougherty, Douglas Druick, Melanie Emerson, Christine Fabian, Margaret Farr, Billy Fernandez, Jon Fiersten, Alison Fisher, Bill Foster, Gloria Groom, Bill Gross, Sarah Guernsey, Susanna Hedblom, Erin Hogan, Beata Hosea, Yau-Mu Huang, Nancy Ireson, Jim Iska, Judith Russi Kirshner, Karolina Kowalczyk, Allison Langley, Tim Lanza, Denise Mahoney, Lauren Makholm, Autumn Mather, Wilson McBee, Suzanne Folds McCullagh, Joseph Mohan, Christopher Monkhouse, Anthony Nakvosas, Elizabeth Neely, Sylvia Neil and Daniel Fischel, Kim Nichols, Greg Nosan, Monica Obniski, Sarah Kelly Oehler, Antoinette Owen, Mark Pascale, Sylvie Penichon, Devon Lee Pyle-Vowles, Tom Riley, Fawn Ring, Heather Roach, Will Robertson, Tim Roby, James Rondeau, Zoë Ryan, Becca Schlossberg, Tina Shah, Chris Shepherd, Elizabeth Siegel, Patrick Smith, Milos Stehlik, Martha Tedeschi, Joseph Vatinno, Kirk Vuillemot, Daniel Walker, Matthew Witkovsky, Jeff Wonderland, P. D. Young, Ghenete Zelleke, Emily Ziemba, Frank Zuccari, and all lenders to the exhibition.

</section>
